ygData.subject: RE: hmm
ygData.msgSnippet: Ahh thanks for clearing that up for me, have never seen it before so I just assumed (see what I know about palidins).. Hmm still rather nice.. ... From: Grant
ygData.messageBody:
Ahh thanks for clearing that up for me, have never seen it before so I just
assumed (see what I know about palidins).. Hmm still rather nice..



-----Original Message-----
From: Grant Vanderhule [mailto:vandergm@...]
Sent: Monday, October 18, 1999 10:16 AM
To: shadowknight@onelist.com
Subject: [shadowknight] hmm


From: Grant Vanderhule <vandergm@...>

the emerald armor bp is NOT the paladin quest bp. it is a rather obscure
quest item that has been in the game for some time, but few if any paladins
have released the details. the paladin armor is called RONIUM armor. if you
see stats for armor that is named something else, then that is not the quest
armor :)

Beld Demonblade
Fennin Ro
